greeting.title: Hi I'm {{name}}!
greeting.subtitle: I'm a Computer Scientist who loves technology and especially Artifical Intelligence, from researching new applications to how to bring the state of the art to be a common tool for everyday use.

skills.title: Skills
skills.subtitle: Technologies and tools I have used

list.1: Developments with the most used Machine Learning and data analysis libraries in Python, Tensorflow, Keras, scikit-learn, scipy, numpy, pandas, matplotlib, seaborn, etc..
list.2: Web developments with Java Spring, Spring Boot, Grails, Laravel, etc..
list.3: Use of PostgreSQL and Grafana pfor real-time and big data analysis and data visualizations.
list.4: Use of nodejs and Electron in personal projects.
list.5: Development very oriented to the use of Docker containers, Git and Git Flow
